title: Chillena Lyrics Raja Rani Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Chillena
Singer: Â Clinton Cerejo, Alphonse, Alka
Music: G. V. Prakash Kumar
Movie: Raja Rani		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Chillena oru mazhai thuli
ennai nenaikudhey penney
siragugal yaar koduthadhu
nenjam parakudhey munney

un vizhigaliely oh ho..
naan vazhgiren penney
un kanavugalaa hoi ..
naan maarinen kanney

Ada karupatiye en cheeni kilange
sirichi kavukaadha
en kannukuttiye kamma karaye
nee kappal ottaadha

Kannaala paakaama kannaalam pannalaama?
kai korthu polaama ?

Konjam paarthu vidu
konjam pesi vidu endru
en vizhigal haiyayo enna thitta
kodai kaala mazhai
vandhu pona pinnum
saalyoram maram thannaale neer sotta

Ennai thaakum puyaley
iravodu kaayum veyiley
unnaaley .. noolilaa
kaatraadi aaneney .
adi penne .. adi kanney..
naan vilundhaaal unpadham serveney

un vizhigaliely oh ho..
naan vazhgiren penney
un kanavugalaa hoi ..
naan maarinen kanney

Chillena oru mazhai thuli
ennai nenaikudhey penney
siragugal yaar koduthadhu
nenjam parakudhey munney

Kadhal vandhavudam kaichal vandhadhadi
meendum naan pilaikka
muthangal tharuvaaya
Kobam kolgayilum
kiranga vaikudhad, meendum orumurai
nee kobathil paarpaayaa

Aalai kollum azhage,
nizha kooda aazhagin nagaley
oru naalummmmm .. mmmmm..
kuraiyaadhaa ohooo...
pudhu bodhai kannoram
thandhaaye
anaithalum anayaadha
oru theeyaai nenjoram
vandhaaye..

adi idam valamaa..
naan aadinen penney
oru idi mazhayaai..
ennai thaakinaai munneyEnglish Translation
I tried my best :)
